body:
Normal AMA but I'll just be honest as much as I can for opinions questions.

Might take me some time to answer since I like making long opinions answers on people I know so, ask away!
body_tagged:
Normal AMA but I'll just be honest as much as I can for opinions questions.

Might take me some time to answer since I like making long opinions answers on people I know so, ask away!
title: TBH & Ref promotion AMA(if that makes sense).

its jajajajja my friend. I dont accept hahaha laugh xd

Anyways a really nice friend of mine, very funny mexican person and chill. I'm glad I'll be working with u(i regret saying that :v) but yeah hope we can make some quality memes together during my referee careers(until I get demoted xd). replies.body:
OK WHERE DO I  START OMG. I met u when I said i wanna die so i gave you my address and everything LOL and thats how we started talking. It was like 3 years ago or so during some random scrim. I really love having you as a friend no matter how annoying to me you are(yes youre very annoying LOOOL but ily). You helped me with many shits even irl problems especially the ones xddd(u know which ones) and I appreciate that so much. We dont talk as we used to but still we do and recently we're talking much more about srs stuff. Anyways ye u can be annoying over the time with your gay memes or however you call them xd but I'm fine with it, I got used to it. You're very mature most of the times but I still find u funny even when your dead serious. I've nothing else against you because youre such an amazing friend and bf xdddd

Fuck yeah we have to no matter what

On competitive scene you became legend once you came back(it was ages ago) and people think u cheated. imo u did look muy sketchy on my pov when we fought on avi but when we 1v1ed u looked completely normal(again dont go hard on me ://// im not callin you out im just sayin) idk what else to say mate, hope we can do more 1v1s and talk in future

{tag=f486fb3bf20c4dfca246837067bcdabc}

Ahh peachy my boi, I love you so much in all ways you can imagine. I met u the day I joined apollo and from that day I talked to you every day almost. We had shit ton of fun together fucking around on hypixel and farming on avi and doing other things. Each of our convos in ts is very weird with no sense and thats why i  love talking to you. I consider you one of my very close friends in mc and im glad i have u as a friend. One thing i hate about is when YOU SAY YOU'RE GOING AFK FOR 5 MINS AND U COME BACK AFTER 2H OR SO LOL FIX THAT

{tag=9972d2339492408d9fc5c44de5306550}

Opinions?

LOOOL THE FUNNIEST TWAT IVE MET IN THE PAST FEW MONTHS. We met when we were fucking around on hypixel in some party with paulina, mench and others. We were retarded enough to make a massive skybridge in bedwars match LOL. I hope you have pics cuz I dont idk how. Anyways you're incredibly funny person to talk with and have fun with. I got to know u for like 2 weeks already and we already made shit ton of memes together(U KNOW WHICH ONES LOOOL). Before I met you when u had fatlesbian ign i thought ur some little annoying piece of shit but shit mate you proved me im completely wrong. Also idk how are we not demoted yet like fr wtf.

hahahahahaha we’re the best at build battle - yup we should apply for builders here and on hypixel

do you like pineapple on pizza? - do you like macaroni and cheese with chocolate milk? LOL

{tag=ebb3d00417724f08a46aca9b3d71739d}

hi fhelip

Hi sophoe

- opinions?

Ehhhh I know you for like 4 years when I joined ocn, we didnt talk at all but i still remember you. Idk why we didnt talk but probably cuz i was pretty dumb back then and I didnt like to start convos with anyone. But now we started talking then we stopped for some time then we started and now we stopped again and you probably hate me now so :// cant change ur mind at all. I still consider you as my close friend even if u hate me and dont talk to me. Anyways you're very kind mineman woman to have a normal convo with(unlike with gayvid). I simply cant hate u but I can just get a little bit mad at u over the time but thats normal. You roasted the shit outta me and that annoys me a bit but idrc its minecraft so ://. As a player pretty good but ffs talk more dont be andrea :v

- doggos or kittehs? - both

- fav country? - idk croatia isnt bad its very beautiful but everything else sucks

- winter or summer? idk i like both

- do u think aliens exist? - yes im talking to one rn

{tag=f876b8631ccd4ae2acad8a09e2209e81}

I havent talked to you that much so I can judge but I like you enough to say you're a nice guy and really helpful. I like what you're doing for avi with maps and others but ples give me map dev instead of koja ill fix all maps and make avicus great again :). But fr you're a nice staff member imo, not too serious and not too immature so I laik that. Hope we talk more 

{tag=f0058ee57a354c979cc9f97c5a576697}

I consider myself as a very toxic shit and immature most of the times. I just do it so I can look like I'm funny and chill guy. I dont know is it working or no. I find myself pretty communicative and approachable person even tho I dont look like I am. I can be very serious once its needed like during tournaments as player or ref, during scrims and sometimes in a normal talk but depends with who I talk to. I get mad easily but I dont show it too much cuz if you show your weakness some people might use it for their own good to annoy u shit ton and provocate you. Also sometimes i say some weird wise words and stuff like that beacuse its nice and sometimes helpful. I like to make memes with friends and screw around. As a player I think I'm somewhat decent but not amazing at all. I have the worse pc and setup in general on avicus probably and thats my only excuse. Playing with low fps during team fights and stuff like that is very hard and annoying but I'm used to that. I improved a bit but still not good enough and I think i can probably be better if i have decent setup. Idk what else to say about myself but I'm overall nice guy if u get to know me well and even if u dont but once u make me mad a lot I dont promise I will be nice, ill most likely be toxic towards u, sorry :(

{tag=9116d3fa14004adaaecd2eae1d73e383}

My closest friend on avicus. I cant explain how much I trust u and love you eric. I enjoyed talking to you so much before and i wish we talk again but school is being a bitch to everyone :(. You're really good with tech things and I hope one day you can make tech videos and make the meme come true <3 .I said it many times but I still regret not coming to zagreb and visting u :(. You're one of the funniest guys on avicus with quality memes and sense of humor. I like your personality, you dont let people put u down(i think) and thats pretty good. I honestly dk what else to say about you eric. You know I love you and appreciate you being my friend for a long time. I really do hope we talk again like we used to before back in summer 2016. I luf u so much my something.

{tag=ae581e8ee8764471a725c7b79ce540c4}

I'd like an opinion, honeeest one. 

Oh ludcha, you used to be my very close friend on ocn before and then u quitted at some point. I had fun playing tournaments with you on ocn and talking to u in general. I remember good old dronken days with you, i had so much fun in that team. You recently came back again after a break and thats nice. I have feeling you're gonna quit again for few weeks or days sadly. I hope you're doing pretty good irl with schools and other stuffs. As a player, was good defender and pretty good with a bow, your frontlining skills are pretty nice. Hope you wont quit any time soon :(

Also, what do you like to do in your freetime? - I used to make a lot of packs but I lost motivation now, I cant be asked to make a pack all by myself :( I need someone to make packs with me ( {tag=5770cbba386a452e92a9ca9f17a8d2ba} {tag=58b9ab0f83cf43c1b53baecd64ed2838} ). Nowdays I just play bw with a friend and talk with friends every day. Irl I go out with friends on few drinks or play darts and billiard(if thats how u call it) but just when im in a mood not always tho(im lazy)

I still consider you as my close friend even if u hate me and dont talk to me. Anyways you're very kind mineman woman to have a normal convo with(unlike with gayvid). I simply cant hate u but I can just get a little bit mad at u over the time but thats normal. You roasted the shit outta me and that annoys me a bit but idrc its minecraft so ://. {tag=f0058ee57a354c979cc9f97c5a576697}

I consider myself as a very toxic shit and immature most of the times. I just do it so I can look like I'm funny and chill guy. I dont know is it working or no. I find myself pretty communicative and approachable person even tho I dont look like I am. I can be very serious once its needed like during tournaments as player or ref, during scrims and sometimes in a normal talk but depends with who I talk to. I get mad easily but I dont show it too much cuz if you show your weakness some people might use it for their own good to annoy u shit ton and provocate you. Also sometimes i say some weird wise words and stuff like that beacuse its nice and sometimes helpful. I like to make memes with friends and screw around. As a player I think I'm somewhat decent but not amazing at all. I have the worse pc and setup in general on avicus probably and thats my only excuse. Playing with low fps during team fights and stuff like that is very hard and annoying but I'm used to that. I improved a bit but still not good enough and I think i can probably be better if i have decent setup. Idk what else to say about myself but I'm overall nice guy if u get to know me well and even if u dont but once u make me mad a lot I dont promise I will be nice, ill most likely be toxic towards u, sorry :(

{tag=9116d3fa14004adaaecd2eae1d73e383}

My closest friend on avicus. I cant explain how much I trust u and love you eric. I enjoyed talking to you so much before and i wish we talk again but school is being a bitch to everyone :(. You're really good with tech things and I hope one day you can make tech videos and make the meme come true <3 .I said it many times but I still regret not coming to zagreb and visting u :(. You're one of the funniest guys on avicus with quality memes and sense of humor. I like your personality, you dont let people put u down(i think) and thats pretty good. I honestly dk what else to say about you eric. You know I love you and appreciate you being my friend for a long time. I really do hope we talk again like we used to before back in summer 2016. I luf u so much my something.
